title: Pressure cooker butternut squash soup
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon vegetable oil', '1 large onion, chopped', '1 large butternut squash, peeled, seeded and diced', '4 potatoes, peeled and cubed', '1 chicken stock cube', '150ml double cream', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper', '200g crème fraîche', '1 bunch fresh coriander or chives', 'Parmesan cheese, grated']
